name: Max and Rex's Adventure
blurb: Our goal is build and develop a cell phone / ipad app called \u201cMax and Rex Adventure\u201d. Featuring the characters we designed and created.

rewards.reward: A great thanks from our team and the peace of mind that this adventure is on its way!
Exclusive Max and Rex Proud Backers' Desktop Wallpaper!! (of course with our great thanks!)
A free download of the game demo when it's released + All of the above!

Max and Rex Button Set (2 Buttons) and Post Card Set (2 Card) + All of the above! International backers outside of US please include $5 to your pledge for shipping. The buttons and post cards will be shipped in July while the rest of the rewards will be shipped according to the dates listed above.

Limited Edition Max and Rex backers' T-shirt in your size (Unisex XS - XL) + All of the above! International backers outside of US please include $10 to your pledge for shipping. The shirt will be shipped in October while the rest of the rewards will be shipped according to the dates listed above.

Limited Edition Max and Rex Poster featuring the characters from the game and a PDF version of the Max and Rex Art Book + All of the above! The Art Book includes concept sketches, character and level designs, interview with the designers, and many more! International backers outside of US please include $20 to your pledge for shipping. \r\n\r\nThe poster will be shipped in October and the PDF Art Book will be sent by November, while the rest of the rewards will be shipped earlier according to the dates listed above.

A Max and Rex Adventure In-game credit as a major supporter with an autographed Limited Edition Max and Rex Poster and Post Cards Set + All of the above! The In-game credit will be fulfilled when the game launch. The rest of the rewards will be shipped earlier per the dates listed above. International backers outside of US please include $20 to your pledge for shipping.

A Backers Exclusive printed Max and Rex Concept Color Art Book, autographed by the all designers + All of the above. The art book includes concept sketches, character and level designs, interviews with the designers, and many more! The art book will be shipped in November, while the rest of the rewards will be shipped earlier according to the dates listed above. International backers outside of US please include $35 to your pledge for shipping.

Original 8 x 10 black and white sketch of Max and Rex signed by the artist + All of the above. The original sketch will be shipped by October, while the rest of the rewards will be shipped earlier according to the dates listed above.\r\nInternational backers outside of US please include $35 to your pledge for shipping.

Color rendered portrait of Donor (same cartoon style) with Max and Rex, signed and framed + All of the above. The high res digital file of the rendering will be delivered as well. The sketch and the renderings will be shipped by October, while the rest of the rewards will be shipped earlier according to the dates listed above.

Donor will be thanked on Max & Rex website and social media pages, and to be featured in comic strip as a character in the story published online + plus any and all of the above! The comic will be created and fulfilled by December 2012, while the rest of the rewards will be shipped earlier according to the dates listed above.
